page.title: 10Crowton Post Office
page.content: The Post Office and shop were built in Crowton 32 years ago, but there was originally a shop by the stream and the public house. The shop sells most goods like sweets, cooked meats, coffee, tea and most other foods. The most expensive goods are cigarettes. The shop opens from 06.00 hrs. until 17.00 hrs. Bread and newspapers are delivered each morning. The Daily Mail is the most popular newspaper. Newspapers are not delivered from the shop. People come to the shop for them. The Post Office opens at 09.00 hrs. The postman comes twice a day and collects letters and parcels. Most people use the Post Office for stamps, pensions and unemployment benefits. Many people do their food shopping at Northwich and use the village shop for odd items.
